name: Plant Encyclopedia
description: A web app displaying plant data from a custom JSON source in card format. This project highlights asynchronous data retrieval using the Fetch API, dynamic DOM updates, cache-busting techniques, and integrating JSON into a web UI.
techStack: The application is structured using HTML, styled with CSS/Bootsrap, and incorporates interactivity through JavaScript. The JavaScript code interacts with an external JSON data source, fetches data using the Fetch API, and dynamically updates the DOM to display the retrieved data.

name: Form and Excel functions
description: The project is a web application with a main page containing a form and a secondary page demonstrating Excel-like functions. From this project, one can learn how to create and process web forms, implement Excel-like functions in a webpage, manipulate the DOM using JavaScript, handle user events, and dynamically switch between dark and light themes using Web Storage.
techStack: The application is developed using HTML for structure, CSS/Bootstrap for styling, and JavaScript for interactivity and functionality. The JavaScript code leverages the Document Object Model (DOM) to manipulate webpage elements and handle events, and it also uses Web Storage (localStorage) to save theme preferences.

name: Area Calculator
description: The application is a web-based area calculator that allows users to compute the area of various geometric shapes and visualizes these shapes using SVG.  From this project creates interactive web forms, perform mathematical calculations in JavaScript, manipulate SVG graphics in the DOM, and integrate with external JavaScript libraries.
techStack: The calculator is built using HTML for structure and uses Bootstrap for styling. The main interactivity and calculations are achieved using embedded JavaScript. Additionally, the application leverages external libraries like jQuery, JavaScript components for mathematical operations.

name: Document and Invoice App
description: A Python-based toolset designed to create, process, and analyze invoice documents. Generate random invoice Word documents and extract specific invoice data to populate an Excel spreadsheet. This project automate document creation and processing in Python. It showcases the capabilities of the docx and openpyxl libraries, using techniques for generating randomized data, creating Word documents programmatically, and extracting specific information from documents.
techStack: Developed in Python, the application leverages the docx library to create and manipulate Word documents, and the openpyxl library for Excel operations. It employs regular expressions and random data generation techniques to simulate real-world invoice creation and processing.

name: Dulce De Leche Page
description: A webpage showcasing Dulce De Leche with a dynamic navbar, interactive image gallery, and wave effects using SVGs for styling. This project offers insights into creating responsive navbars, crafting image galleries, and enhancing web interactivity using JavaScript, emphasizing the distinctive design potential of SVG.
techStack: The webpage is structured using HTML, styled with CSS and Bootsrap — including the use of SVG for unique design effects — and incorporates interactivity through JavaScript. The JavaScript code dynamically modifies the DOM based on user interactions like scrolling and clicking, thereby enhancing the user experience.

name: NASA Image App
description: The application is a JavaFX-based tool designed to fetch and present NASA Images through an external API  With a user-friendly interface, users can navigate and explore various space and NASA related  images, each represented with details like ID, title, date and description.
techStack: Developed in Java with JavaFX for the graphical user interface. It utilizes the Gson library for JSON parsing, data interactions with a JSON-based external API. Use of MVC (Model-View-Controller) design pattern , with separate classes for managing API interactions, data representation, and user interface control.

name: Game List Webapp
description: The application is a web-based platform that presents information about various games. Users can interact with game data, presented in a structured format. This project showcases the process of building web applications with ASP.NET Core MVC.
techStack: Developed using ASP.NET Core MVC, the application adheres to the MVC (Model-View-Controller) pattern. It emphasizes the creation and management of models, services, and controllers, data retrieval and manipulation in JSON format. It utilizes models to represent data; services for business logic and controllers for routing and logic.

name: ChatZone
description: A real-time chat application with integrated video calling.
